editorial.content:
The Daily Annual is a daily yearly newspaper. It focuses on nothing specific, usually just humor. The news articles are some of the most interesting news in the history of the world.
The Daily Annual has a vast history; Founded in 2011, The Daily Annual is on the cutting edge of news technology. When one asks, "How can you be a daily and yearly newspaper?" I simply respond, "It's pretty simple, we have a newspaper every day, but also every year".
